title: NHK World Takes A Look At How Coronavirus (COVID-19) Is Affecting Anime Production
description: The 7-minute deep dive aired on the station in March In March, NHK World Japan, the foreign language arm of the Japanese public broadcaster NHK, aired a special deep-dive into the effect that the coronavirus (COVID-19) was having on anime production and busin…
